Sentencas: In most planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) stack designs, the interconnect, which is typically made from an oxidation resistant alloy, potentially including austenitic chromia-forming, ferritic chromia-forming, and alumina-forming alloys, has to be hermitically sealed to its adjacent components, usually by a sealing glass.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: To maintain the structural stability and minimize the degradation of stack performance, the sealing glass must be chemically compatible with the alloy used for the interconnect.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: In this work, Nicrofer6025, AISI446 and a Fecralloy were selected as examples of austenitic chromia-forming, ferritic chromia-forming, and alumina-forming alloys, respectively.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: Their chemical compatibility with a barium-calcium-aluminosilicate (BCAS)-based glass, specifically developed as a sealant in SOFC stacks, was evaluated.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: It was found that the BCAS sealing glass interacted chemically with both the chromia-forming alloys and the alumina-forming alloys.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: The extent and nature of the interactions and their final products depended on the matrix alloy compositions, the exposure conditions and/or proximity of the glass/alloy interface to the ambient air.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys

Sentencas: These interactions and their mechanisms will be discussed with the assistance of thermodynamic modeling.
Titulo: Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys
Chemical interactions of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate-based sealing glasses with oxidation resistant alloys
